article: Mrs Smith has three children, Peter, Jenny and Linda. Jenny is the oldest and Linda is the youngest. Peter is in the  _  , but he is the tallest one. Peter is very  _  , so he is on a diet . He tries not to  _  too much meat. He also  does exercise  every day. He runs every day. Now Peter is becoming thinner and stronger. Jenny is a  _  . Maybe she is the busiest person in the family. She  _  rests at home and her family can often see her reporting news  _  TV. As a housewife, Mrs Smith is the  freest  in the family. she can do everything she likes. she likes both  _  and taking pictures .  _  she often shows the pictures of the delicious food she cooks on her blog . She has a lot of fans.
